mapper.select: select distinct t.branchNum, p.purchasefilmNum, p.purchaseDate, p.filmdeadline,f.filmNum, f.filmName, f.filmStory, g.genreName, m.movieimgurl from theather t,purchasefilm p, film f, movieimg m, genre g, branch b where t.branchNum=#{branchNum} and p.purchasefilmNum=#{purchasefilmNum} and p.filmNum=f.filmNum and f.filmNum=m.filmNum and f.genreNum=g.genreNum and b.branchNum=p.branchNum and t.branchNum=b.branchNum
